required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pulpal Blood Flow Changes Using SuperElastic 0.018-inch Nickel Titanium
clinical_study.official_title: Pulpal Blood Flow Changes Related to Using SuperElastic 0.018-inch Nickel Titanium as the First Orthodontic Alignment Archwire: A Prospective Clinical Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: Jordan University of Science and Technology

clinical_study.source: Jordan University of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock: to record pulpal blood flow (PBF) changes associated with using 0.018-inch Nickel Titanium (NiTi) as the first alignment archwire during fixed orthodontic treatment.

detailed_description.textblock:
Forty healthy patients with lower arch mild crowding with less than 2mm contact point displacement at any teeth were included. A split mouth study design was applied. Where each patient received 2 archwire sizes at one time joined in the midline by crimpable hook and applied in the lower arch.
Patients were assigned into one of 2 groups based on archwire sizes used. Group (1); 0.014-inch and 0.018-inch NiTi and Group (2); 0.016-inch and 0.018-inch NiTi. A Laser Doppler Flowmeter was used to measure PBF at different time intervals (T0-T5).

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: A split mouth study design was applied. Each patient received 2 archwire sizes at one time joined in the midline by crimpable hook and applied in the lower arch. Patients were assigned into one of 2 groups based on archwire sizes used. Group 1:- 0.014-inch and 0.018-inch NiTi Group 2:- 0.016-inch and 0.018-inch NiTi.
study_design_info.masking_description: Psarticipants did not know which size is allocated/side.

primary_outcome.description: Measurements were taken by the use of Laser Doppler Flowmeter mm/s

arm_group.description: 0.014-inch NiTi on one side /0.018-inch NiTi on the other side (Nitinol SuperElastic 3M, Unitek) for initial alignment. This group included 20 patients
0.016-inch NiTi on one side / 0.018-inch NiTi on the other side (Nitinol SuperElastic 3M, Unitek) for initial alignment. This group included 20 patients

intervention.intervention_name: 0.014-inch NiTi on one side /0.018-inch NiTi on the other side
intervention.description: Where each patient received 2 archwire sizes (0.014-inch and 0.018-inch) at one time joined in the midline by crimpable hook and applied in the lower arch.

intervention.intervention_name: 0.016-inch NiTi on one side /0.018-inch NiTi on the other side
intervention.description: Where each patient received 2 archwire sizes (0.016-inch and 0.018-inch) at one time joined in the midline by crimpable hook and applied in the lower arch.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- age 18-25 years
- Class I skeletal malocclusion
- Mild lower arches crowding.
- Contact point displacement less than 2 mm.
- No previous orthodontic treatment
Exclusion Criteria:
- Missing teeth
- Poor oral hygiene
- deep carious teeth
- history of previous trauma
- any medical conditions affecting blood vessels
- smokers

overall_official.affiliation: Jordan University of Science and Technology

facility.name: Dental Faculty/Jordan university of Science and Technology Dental Teaching Clinics

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Jordan University of Science and Technology
